front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks---Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks Amendment: Multiple Backbone Service Instance Identifier (I-SID) Registration Protocol (MIRP)
front.abstract: This standard specifies protocols, procedures, and managed objects to support topology change signaling to alter the binding (held in an I-Component) of Customer addresses to Backbone addresses on a per-I-SID basis. This is accomplished by extending the use of the Multiple Registration Protocol (MRP).
